description.para: Events recognized and handled by the SMP state machine.

detaileddescription.para: Send next key to be distributed
User keypress complete in passkey pairing
An early Confirm from the initiator in passkey pairing
Cleanup control information and return to IDLE state

briefdescription.para: Event handler messages for SMP state machines.

description.para: Pointer to structure containing initialization details of the SMP Subsystem. To be configured by Application.
Legacy and Secure Connections initialization for Initiator and Responder roles.

briefdescription.para: Initialize SMP initiator role utilizing BTLE Secure Connections.
Initialize SMP responder role utilizing BTLE Secure Connections.
Use this SMP init function when SMP is not supported.

description.para: Functions that allow the DM to send messages to SMP.

briefdescription.para: This function is called by DM to send a message to SMP.
This function is called by DM to notify SMP of encrypted link status.
Check if LE Secure Connections is enabled on the connection.

simplesect.para: true is Secure Connections is enabled, else false

briefdescription.para: Return the STK for the given connection.

parameterdescription.para: Returns the security level of pairing when STK was created.

simplesect.para: Pointer to STK or NULL if not available.

briefdescription.para: Format a cancel message with consideration for the attempts counter.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to header of message to fill.

briefdescription.para: Called to force the DhKey to zero for qualification test purposes.

parameterdescription.para: true - Force DhKey to zero. false - Use calculated key
